subject: Automobile Racing
Automobiles
Blacks
lead_paragraph: Antron Brown, who, could become the first African-American to win a major N.H.R.A. title, gave up running college track for an offer to race motorcycles.
snippet: Antron Brown, who, could become the first African-American to win a major N.H.R.A. title, gave up running college track for an offer to race motorcycles.
